definition: overcast (weather)/cloudy/shady/Yin (the negative principle of Yin and Yang)/negative (electric.)/feminine/moon/implicit/hidden/genitalia

sentences.english: Then he made another lucky draw for a couple of fans to have a taste of his own-cooked Tom Yum Kung.
sentences.chinese: 然後他給了二個粉絲幸運的品嚐他自己煮的冬陰功湯。

definition: Guangdong pidgin (a mix of Standard Mandarin and Cantonese)
(Tw) (coll.) matter/thing/(Taiwanese, Tai-lo pr. [tāi-tsì], equivalent to Mandarin 事情[shi4 qing5])
I appreciate your kindness (conventional reply to turn down an offer)
to sleep (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 睡覺|睡觉[shui4 jiao4]
to work as a good-time girl/to prostitute oneself
saying in which the second part, uttered after a pause or totally left out, is the intended meaning of the allegory presented in the first part
ungrateful/heartless/to fail to be loyal to one's love
